Package main

Class TextGameEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.TextGameEnvironment
  • public class TextGameEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    Conducts all game logic to play the Space Explorer game. Runs using input and output from the console.
    Author:
    Daniel Harris and Rebekah McKinnon

    • Field Summary

        Whether or not there are parts on this planet.

        The index of the Planet Array to get the planet the ship is on.

      • PLANET_ARRAY

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> PLANET_ARRAY
        A list of planets that can be visited.

      • ATTACK_PROBABILITY

        private final int[] ATTACK_PROBABILITY
        A list of percentage probabilities. At the end of each day, 20% chance to have an item stolen, 20% chance to have a crew member infected, and 60% chance for no special event.

      • ASTEROID_PROBABILITY

        private final int[] ASTEROID_PROBABILITY
        A list of percentage probabilities. When the ship is piloted, 30% chance to run into an Asteroid field, and 70% chance for no special event.

      • FOOD_ITEMS

        private final Consumable[] FOOD_ITEMS
        A list of all the available food items.

      • MEDICAL_ITEMS

        private final Consumable[] MEDICAL_ITEMS
        A list of all the available medical items.

      • FINDABLE_MONEY

        private final java.lang.Integer[] FINDABLE_MONEY
        A list of all the amounts of money that can be found each time a planet is searched.
